header.title: User Blog Mod
header.description: Adds Blogs to a phpBB3 board.
header.author-notes: PHP versions less than 5.1.0 are NOT supported.

changelog.change: Multiple bugs, #93, 94, 96, 99
Update ModX
[Feature] Adding simple canonical URLs
[Feature] Anti-Spam ACP plugin
[Fix] Display poll creation errors #106
[Fix] Hide profile buttons that should not appear on guests #105
[Fix] Don't apply sid's multiple times on the non-seo urls #104
[Fix] Do not redirect to the item posted if it needs approval first #103
[Fix] Fix incorrect counting of replies when updating num_blog_replies on deleting a blog entry #92
[Fix] Invalid subsilver2 HTML #107
[Fix] Subscribe link for Coda #110
[Fix] Delete a user's blog replies when deleting the user
[Fix] Correct the update link for versions < 0.9.0
Update UMIL
[Fix] Fix problems with language packs if the user selects a language other than the board default #134
[Fix] Fix error when editing blog entries/replies with attachments as a different user
[Fix] Custom Profile Fields Disappear When SEO URLs are enabled
[Fix] Output the age with the user data
[Fix] Incorrect links in the Recent Comments feed
[Fix] Stricter checking on inputs for SQL queries (prevent duplicates in WHERE and enforce int on integers)
[Fix] Poll vote count problems with first poll item #174
[Fix] Poll time setting not stopping users from voting after expiration #141
[Fix] Miscellaneous Bugs
[Change] Remove some of the excessive caching
[Change] Code to display the blog links on view PM (code in blog/header.php, disabled by default because it requires adding code to view pm template)
Update UMIL
[Fix] Fix voting on polls when Run poll for days = 0
